inclusion.criterion: COPD and increased SPAP >55 on echocardiogram
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of COPD according to GOLD guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient can read, understand and sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other identified cause for pulmonary hypertension
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial.
